reviewText: Good thing about the DVD is that there is plenty of Chinese dialogue. However the quality of the animation isn't the best. This doesn't make it any less appealing to a 2 yr old though! It would have been nice if they included some chinese songs. However I will be getting the other DVDs in the series once we have this one mastered!
I like the rate of how this product teaches Chinese. Not too fast but not too slow either. It teaches colors and a few phrases.

We now have volumes 1 and 2 of Let's Go Guang.
My kids love both.
We are looking forward to volume 3.
